TestCase.author: apetrovsky@aras.com
TestCase.Description: Create Item of Item Type Part with Mechanical Part/Component classification as Industrial Engineer, created in 'Setup Test.xml'

Request.Comments: Given: An user with Industrial Engineer identity When: The user tries to create a part with Mechanical Part/Component classification. Then: An innovator should return an access error.

SOAP-ENV:Fault.faultstring: Add access is denied for Part.

detail.af:legacy_detail: Add access is denied for Part.

af:exception.message: Add access is denied for Part.
